Function: Reveal all cards in each player’s Bank.
Muster: If starting Deck contains only Universal cards: Draw 4 cards; deal 4 damage to any target; give one unit +4/+4; gain 4 life; and return target Wasted Unit with cost up to 4 to Battlefield.
While this Unit is on the Battlefield, all Combat Damage is lethal (Units are Wasted by taking any Combat Damage).

Each time this card is placed on a Unit, put a +1/+1 counter on Memento of the Fallen. When this Unit dies, you may put this card on another Unit. If this card is Wasted on your opponent’s term, remove all counters and put this card in your hand.
Name a card type (Relic, Unit, Upgrade or Effect). Reveal two of the Enemy’s Banked cards. If either card matches the named card type, draw a card.
Select a Unit. If an Effect would that Unit, it targets Rug Poll instead.
The top card of your Deck is always face up. You can Waste a card you control including Bank cards to waste the top card of your Deck.
Until the end of your turn, you may play any revealed cards in your bank as though they were in your hand.
At the start of your turn, instead of drawing a card, look at the top 3 cards, put one in your hand, and the other two on the bottom of your deck in a random order.
When the upgraded unit dies, deal 1 damage to all enemy units. Then, bank this upgrade instead of wasting it.
Whenever you play an Upgrade, draw a card.
When this Unit enters the Battlefield, you may equip one Upgrade from your Bank onto it. When this Unit is Wasted, Banish all Upgrades attached to it.
Upgraded Unit receives +4/+0. When this Unit dies, deal its damage to all Friendly Units.
When this Upgrade enters the Battlefield it becomes a copy of any other Upgrade on the Battlefield.
All Damage dealt and received by Friendly Units is increased by 1.
Copy all Upgrades from one Friendly Unit to another.
Upgraded Unit receives +0/+4.
Target Unit gains Pacifist.
At the beginning of each player’s turn, put a counter on this card and give that player’s Unit Pacifist. When there are 6 counters on this card, Waste it.

At the start of your turn, put a counter on this card. When there are 3 or more counters on this card, Waste this card and put any Banked Units onto the Battlefield. All Units gain “Battle Ready” until end of turn. Ignores Pacifist.
As long as your Health is above 10, this Unit has Pacifist. If your Health is 10 or below, this Unit’s Attack and Health values are swapped and it loses Pacifist.
Equipped Unit gets +1/+4 and gains Defender. Whenever this Unit deals damage to a player, that player must reveal a banked card. Whenever this Unit takes damage, reveal a banked card.
Heal yourself 5 Health.

At the end of your turn, if no combat damage was dealt this turn, pick one Unit you control. That Unit gains Armed and fights a target enemy Unit on the Battlefield. If there is no Unit to fight, Waste this Unit.
Once per turn, pick a Unit that gained Health or healed this turn. Then swap that Unit’s Health with its Attack for the rest of the turn.
At the Start of your turn, Create a 0/1 Defender. Intel: 3 Create a 2/1 Defender instead (Intel: X: X Enemy Bank Cards must be revealed)
Create a copy of a Unit of your choice from your Bank. It gains “Battle Ready” and “at the end of your turn, waste this Unit.” It is a Clone.
Shuffle 4 copies of a Banked Kathari Unit into your deck. Waste the card that was copied.
Draw all copies of target Unit from your Deck.
When played, Enemy draws 2 cards and picks one to show you. They put the other card on top of their Deck and Waste the shown card. This card becomes a copy of the shown card.
Transform target Enemy Unit into a copy of target friendly Unit.
At the start of your turn, if you have a Clone on the Field, this Unit gains +1/+1.
Create three 1/1 Clones with Defender.
Create a copy of a Non-Leader Unit of the Field.
Muster: Spend all remaining energy. Reveal a banked Unit equal to the amount of energy Spent, this Unit becomes a copy of the Revealed Unit.
Waste a Friendly Unit. Deal damage equal to that Unit’s Attack to all Enemy Units.
Whenever you play an Effect card, this Unit gains +1/+1.
Whenever another Vehicle enters the Battlefield, Earth Breaker Cannon deals 5 damage to any Unit.
Cause a Unit to attack an adjacent Unit.
Deal 3 Damage to the Enemy Unit. If that Unit is Wasted, deal 2 Damage to a new Enemy Unit. If that Unit is Wasted, deal 1 Damage to a new Enemy Unit.
Deal 5 damage to any target.
Muster: waste up to three cards in your bank. Deal 3 damage to any Unit for each card Wasted. You may choose a new Unit for each card.
When this Unit attacks, deal 1 damage to both players.
Banish 1 random card from your hand then Draw 2.
Discard any number of cards and draw that many. You lose life equal to the number of cards discarded. If you discarded every card in your hand, Banish the discarded cards instead.
Banish all Units to your Singularity.

You no longer draw cards at the start of your turn or at the end of your turn if you Banked a card. Instead, Draw one random card from either your Deck, or Singularity whenever an Effect is played by either Player.
Waste Target Unit or Relic
Place a Banked card face up under this Relic. That card produces 2 energy each turn. If this Relic is destroyed or removed, Waste the Card underneath. When this Relic is Wasted, lose 4 Life.
